Name: Anime Knight: Card Game
About the game: Anime Knight: Card Game game that blends deckbuilding and turn-based strategies on a warzone. Combine different cards strategy to overcome unique challenges you will face. But be careful. This is an intense strategy game: make decisions at every round! Plan your moves, then adjust to the actions of the AI and new cards drawn. You can counter your enemies by choosing Elf, Goblin or other cards. You can build your powerful deck and crush your enemys. Go and defeat your enemies one by one!
